gdpr.title: General Data Protection Regulation(GDPR)
gdpr.topic1: Identity and contact details of the Controller
gdpr.legalBasis: Based on Article 6(1)(a) (data subject’s consent to processing of their personal data) from the General Data Protection Regulation (2016/679).
gdpr.controller: Graphs4Social, S.A with NIPC 507698123, located in Rua de Augusto Lessa, 4200-059, Porto, Portugal, is the data controller, and is available to be contacted via e-mail graphs4social@gmail.com and telephone +351 227909678.
gdpr.purpose1: To ensure the normal operation of the game (suggesting connection requests) the following data is collected:
gdpr.purpose2: For the purpose of logging into the platform the following data is collected:
gdpr.purpose3: For the purpose of importing pre-existing links between users the following data is collected:
gdpr.purpose4: For the purpose of Profile personalization the following data is collected:
gdpr.purpose5: For the purpose of validating the age of the user (18 years old or older) the following data is collected:
gdpr.purpose6: For the purpose of ensuring the normal operation of the game (calculation of the relationship strength in a connection) the following data is collected:
gdpr.purpose7: For the purpose of ensuring the normal operation of the game (interaction between players) the following data is collected:
gdpr.right1: The data collected is deleted after six months of inactivity (without logging into the account).
gdpr.right2: The Data Subject has the right to request access to his or her data at any time by selecting the “Profile” option from the main menu.
gdpr.right3: The Data Subject has the right to request rectification of his/her data at any time, to do so, he/she must select the "Profile" option from the main menu and once there, select "Edit Profile", being able to modify the following data: the name, description, phone number, date of birth, country, city, LinkedIn profile link, Facebook profile link, emotional state, and tags.
gdpr.right4: The Data Subject has the right to request the deletion of his/her data at any time by selecting the "Profile" option from the main menu and once there, selecting "Edit Profile" and finally selecting "Delete Profile". Afterwards a confirmation box is displayed, in which you should select "Delete Profile" again.
gdpr.right5: The Data Subject has the right to withdraw consent to data processing at any time by selecting the "Profile" option from the main menu and selecting the checkbox"I wish to withdraw consent to data processing", whereupon the Data Subject will be unable to continue playing.
gdpr.right6: The Data Subject is entitled to lodge a complaint with the Comissão Nacional de Proteção de Dados, located at Av. D. Carlos I, 134, 19, 1200-651 Lisbon, with telephone number +351 213 928 400, fax number +351 213 976 832, e-mail address geral@cnpd.pt and website at https://www.cnpd.pt.
